name: Wonderland Ripper X
description:
Arrow keys to aim
Z to shoot
X to jump
C to change weapon
Wits to stay alive
Heart to keep true to your love
True friendship is a rarity. You should cherish and celebrate it. Abandon your vanity. And remember always, missiles are anti-air defense.

This game is a collaboration between Raeleus and DragonQueen. DragonQueen provided the art and the spirit of the game. Meanwhile, Raeleus toiled in his dark room for a week, plotting the demise of anyone who dared play this game...
